oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tall Tales - #73 - 'The Inn Keeper's Ghost'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Tall Tales, episode #73. Featuring the tale 'The Inn Keeper's Ghost', written by Bill Woolsey, produced by Marjorie Cooney, with ballad singer George Grise. Original broadcast date of April 12, 1955.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Grise
